name: Simon "Somber" Paxton
description:
Sergeant Simon "Somber" Paxton

There is no accurate information neither about the native country nor family. However in 2080 Simon was recruited to STF (Special Task Force) and outstandingly served the US government for three decades. After failure of STF group amid secret stealth mission on chinese thermo-nuclear weapon plant that led to global political catastrophe US government disavowed STF's last living member — Simon and declared him as persona non grata. He was imprisoned with nine life sentences but only after 7 years he broke his way to freedom and joined bio-terrorist organization in Mexico. Bringing terror to civilians — he's new only duty.
